_header: In manner which enlumineth every estate
Subjects: children, instructions for behavior of; manners, treatises on; courtesy books; translations
_description: Stans puer ad mensam — nineteen stanzas rhyme royal

CamMagPep1236.First Lines:
In maner whyche enlumynyth euery astateto discerne the doctrine
                    chylde geue attendaunce…
CamMagPep1236.Last Lines:
…among them þat ben of þe contre of famehe taught me
                    this Grostede was is name
CamMagPep1236.Attributed Title:
Stans puer ad mensam dm’ bona dogmata discasDum loqueris digiti
                    que manus in pace pedes sint (first heading, f. 110v)
CamMagPep1236.Editions:
Nicholls,  Jonathan. 
             “An Unpublished Courtesy Poem from Magdalene College Pepys 1236.” 
             Notes and Queries
         n.s. 29 [227] (1982): 3-10: 5-10.
